property.name: id
property.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
        var _item_open = km.getItem("open");
        alert(_item_open.id);
    }
</script>

method.name: get_text
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
		var item = listbox.get_item(3);
		alert(item.get_text());
    }
</script>

method.name: get_value
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
		var item = listbox.get_item(3);
		alert(item.get_value());
    }
</script>

method.name: get_index
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
		var item = listbox.get_item(3);
		alert(item.get_index());//Return 3
    }
</script>

method.name: get_data
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
		var item = listbox.get_item(3);
		var item_data = item.get_data();
		alert(item_data["mydata"]);//Suppose you added a datum called mydata into item at server-side.
    }
</script>

method.name: enable
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">

</script>

method.name: unselect
method.shortdesc: If item is selected, then the function will unselect this item.
method.longdesc: If item is selected, then the function will unselect this item.
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
		var item = listbox.get_item(3);
		item.unselect();
    }
</script>

</script>

method.name: set_imageurl
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
		var item = listbox.get_item(3);
		item.set_imageurl("image/canada.jpg");
    }
</script>

method.name: set_tooltip
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
		var item = listbox.get_item(3);
		item.set_tooltip("Choose canada.");
    }
</script>

method.name: set_data
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
		var item = listbox.get_item(3);
		var data = item.get_data();
		data["MyData"] = "My value";
		item.set_data(data);
    }
</script>

method.name: get_selected
method.shortdesc: Get whether the item is selected.
method.longdesc: Get whether the item is selected.
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
		var item = listbox.get_item(3);
		alert(item.get_selected());
    }
</script>

method.name: get_element
method.shortdesc: Get the html element of item.
method.longdesc: Get the html element of item.
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
		var item = listbox.get_item(3);
		var _item_li_html = item.get_element();
		_item_li_html.style.fontSize = "13px";
    }
</script>

method.name: get_enabled
method.shortdesc: Get whether the item is enabled.
